title: Ok, if you had a choice... would you rather...
body:
1: Have THE MOST TOXIC team who'd constanly critique you on every move you make
#AND YOU CANT MUTE THEM
But you win every game while playing with them..

#OR

2: Have THE FUNNEST, MOST LIKABLE Team ever, who will be inspired by your plays
#AND WILL GIFT YOU EVERY TIME YOU PLAY WITH THEM
But they udderly suck balls and lose 3-65 every game.
